text: Sinhala may refer to: * Something of or related to the Sinhalese people of Sri Lanka * Sinhalese people * Sinhala language, one of the three official languages used in Sri Lanka * Sinhala script, a writing system for the Sinhala language ** Sinhala (Unicode block), a block of Sinhala characters in Unicode * Sinhala cinema * Sinhala Kingdom, the Lankan kingdom mentioned in the Mahābhārata * "Sinhala", a song from the 1999 album The Magical Sounds of Banco de Gaia Category:Language and nationality disambiguation pages
title: Sinhala
